title: Fruit Ninja VR Free Download
description:
Get Fruit Ninja VR PC game for free instantly and play pre-installed on SteamRiP
The juiciest, most action-packed burst of fruit-filled fun is here! Re-imagined by the immersive power of virtual reality, Fruit Ninja VR brings you closer to the action than ever before. From backyard to battleground, transform your world as you compete against rival players in Four Diverse and Exciting Modes: Hearts of Iron IV
Leaderboards: Fancy yourself the ultimate ninja? Compare against friends and foe from all over the world Index Controller Support: The power is in your hands Index support allows you to truly feel the blade within your grasp. Dynamic Weather: Strike in the night or hide in plain sight. Take a moment amidst the chaos to witness the transition from sun-filled skies to dazzling starry nights
